title: SimCenter WE-UQ CFD Modeling of Generic Tall Building
description: JSON Schema for computational grid generation using snappyHexMesh meshing tool of OpenFOAM.

domainLength.description: Length of the domain in x-direction.

domainWidth.description: Width of the domain in y-direction.

domainHeight.description: Height of the domain in z-direction.

fetchLength.description: The distance from the inlet upto the target (building) location.

geometricScale.description: Geometric scale at which the simulation is carried out.

relativeDimensions.description: Indicates wether the domain dimensions are relative to the building height (normalized) or not.

origin.description: Reference point or origin of the coordinate system.

buildingSTLName.description: Name of the STL surface representing the building geometry.

castellatedMesh.description: Use castellated mesh or not, needs to be turned on for a good quality mesh.

snapToSurface.description: If turned on the mesh is snapped to the STL surface, needs to be turned on for a good quality mesh.

addEdgeRefinement.description: Adds refinements over the building edge if turned on.

addLayers.description: Add prism layers on building surface or not.

numLayers.description: Number of prism layers to be added.

nCellsBetweenLevels.description: Number of buffer layers between different levels.

resolveFeatureAngle.description: Feature resolution angle to capture sharp angles.

insidePoint.description: A point that will always remains inside the mesh(not surfaces) even after refinement.

refinementRegionType.description: The type of refinement region geometry.
